GSD.product_version: versions from v5.7 to before v6.0.19
GSD.description:
vhost_vdpa: fix the crash in unmap a large memory

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.19 by commit 26b7400c89b81e2f6de4f224ba1fdf06f293de31, it was introduced in version v5.7 by commit 4c8cf31885f69e86be0b5b9e6677a26797365e1d. For more details please see the references link.
